alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 4:44PM EDT until March 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Indian River County in east central Florida... Southeastern Brevard County in east central Florida... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 443 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Malabar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 435 PM EDT dime to nickel sized hail was reported in West Melbourne. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Sebastian, Fellsmere and Malabar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
